ch0119_00_gladion/0101_0701_02_10:
If you’re planning to go out and train again today,
we’d better go ahead and get to it.
ch0119_00_gladion/0601_0701_01_10:
I used to work as hired muscle for an organization
called Team Skull.
ch0119_00_gladion/0601_0701_02_10:
They were a bunch of small-time punks who had
nothing better to do than make trouble for others.
ch0119_00_gladion/0601_0701_03_10: Not that I was any different, though.
ch0119_00_gladion/0601_0701_04_10:
Back then, I didn’t care what I was doing. All I
wanted was for us to get stronger.
ch0119_00_gladion/0602_0701_02_10:
She’s pretty soft-spoken, and she used to hate
even the thought of Pokémon battling each other.
She’s sweet like that.
ch0119_00_gladion/0602_0701_03_10: So sweet, in fact, that it worries me. A lot.
ch0119_00_gladion/0603_0701_01_10:
Pokémon are invaluable companions, but don’t
expect to be all buddy-buddy with them
right away.
ch0119_00_gladion/0603_0701_02_10:
It takes a lot of time and effort to build up trust
with Pokémon.
ch0119_00_gladion/0603_0701_03_10:
Don’t even think about trying to force them to do
what you want. That’s a recipe for disaster.
ch0119_00_gladion/0604_0701_01_10:
I want to become a stronger Trainer. That’s why
I came to Pasio to continue my training.
ch0119_00_gladion/0604_0701_02_10:
The way Pokémon battles are conducted here is
interesting. I’ve never seen anything like it before.
ch0119_00_gladion/0604_0701_03_10:
I also feel like the style of battling as sync pairs
suits me to a T.
ch0119_00_gladion/0604_0701_04_10:
Maybe because battles here foster a clear sense
of battling side-by-side with Pokémon as equals.
ch0119_00_gladion/0605_0701_01_10:
You know, [Name:PlayerNickname ]...
You and your partner Pokémon make a good
sync pair.
ch0119_00_gladion/0605_0701_02_10:
Watching how you two battle, I can tell what kind
of journey you’ve been through.
ch0119_00_gladion/0605_0701_03_10:
Hmph. I guess I still have a long journey ahead
of me.
ch0119_00_gladion/0605_0701_04_10:
I’m glad I have this opportunity to fight alongside
you two on the same team.
ch0119_00_gladion/1701_0701_02_10:
I found it while I was training. I’m sure you’ll find
it useful as well.
ch0119_00_gladion/1701_0702_01_10:
We’re on the same team, after all. It’s the least I
can do.
ch0119_00_gladion/2501_0701_01_10:
Someday my training journey will end. I don’t
know what I’ll do afterward just yet. It’s not like
I haven’t thought about it, though.
ch0119_00_gladion/2501_0701_02_10:
I want to protect everyone with my partner
Pokémon—especially my family. That much I
do know.
ch0119_00_gladion/2501_0701_03_10: Hmph. Look at me opening up to you like this.
ch0119_00_gladion/2501_0701_04_10:
Must be something in the air here that’s making
me soft. It’s not so bad, though, to be honest.
ch0119_00_gladion/2501_0702_01_10:
Do you plan to continue your training? Have you
thought about what to do afterwards?
ch0119_00_gladion/2501_0702_02_10:
There’s no need to rush things. Just keep blazing
forward with your partner and making your
own path.
ch0119_00_gladion/2511_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
Your clothes are getting a little tattered.
ch0119_00_gladion/2511_0701_02_10:
I bet you’ve been so caught up in your battles
that you didn’t even notice, huh? Hmph. Typical.
ch0119_00_gladion/2511_0701_03_10:
I’ve seen this kinda wear and tear before. Nothing
that a little needlework won’t fix.
ch0119_00_gladion/2511_0701_04_10:
What are you looking at me for? I’m not gonna fix
your clothes for you. That’s all you.
ch0119_00_gladion/2511_0702_01_10: What? You want me to teach you how to sew?
ch0119_00_gladion/2511_0702_02_10:
I guess I can show you the ropes. Or threads,
in this case.
ch0119_00_gladion/2511_0702_03_10:
I’m self-taught, though. Don’t come crying to me
later if my methods don’t work for you!
ch0119_00_gladion/3001_0701_01_10: It’s morning now. Time to get cleaned up.
ch0119_00_gladion/3003_0701_01_10: It’s already afternoon? Where does the time go?
ch0119_00_gladion/3005_0701_01_10: It’s a nice night... I hope the moon shows itself.
